speaker: JESSICA
text:
I
               
              am
               
              sorry
               
              thou
               
              wilt
               
              leave
               
              my
               
              father
               
              so
              .

speaker: JESSICA
text:
Our
               
              house
               
              is
               
              hell
               
              and
               
              thou
              ,
               
              a
               
              merry
               
              devil
              ,

speaker: JESSICA
text:
Didst
               
              rob
               
              it
               
              of
               
              some
               
              taste
               
              of
               
              tediousness
              .

speaker: JESSICA
text:
But
               
              fare
               
              thee
               
              well
              .
               
              There
               
              is
               
              a
               
              ducat
               
              for
               
              thee
              ,

speaker: JESSICA
text:
And
              ,
               
              Lancelet
              ,
               
              soon
               
              at
               
              supper
               
              shalt
               
              thou
               
              see

speaker: JESSICA
text:
Lorenzo
              ,
               
              who
               
              is
               
              thy
               
              new
               
              master’s
               
              guest
              .

speaker: JESSICA
text:
Give
               
              him
               
              this
               
              letter
              ,
               
              do
               
              it
               
              secretly
              ,

speaker: JESSICA
text:
And
               
              so
               
              farewell
              .
               
              I
               
              would
               
              not
               
              have
               
              my
               
              father

speaker: JESSICA
text:
See
               
              me
               
              in
               
              talk
               
              with
               
              thee
              .

speaker: LANCELET
text: Adieu. Tears exhibit my tongue, most beautiful

speaker: LANCELET
text: pagan, most sweet Jew. If a Christian do not

speaker: LANCELET
text: play the knave and get thee, I am much deceived.

speaker: LANCELET
text: But adieu. These foolish drops do something drown

speaker: LANCELET
text: my manly spirit. Adieu.

speaker: JESSICA
text:
Farewell
              ,
               
              good
               
              Lancelet
              .

speaker: JESSICA
text:
Alack
              ,
               
              what
               
              heinous
               
              sin
               
              is
               
              it
               
              in
               
              me

speaker: JESSICA
text:
To
               
              be
               
              ashamed
               
              to
               
              be
               
              my
               
              father’s
               
              child
              ?

speaker: JESSICA
text:
But
               
              though
               
              I
               
              am
               
              a
               
              daughter
               
              to
               
              his
               
              blood
              ,

speaker: JESSICA
text:
I
               
              am
               
              not
               
              to
               
              his
               
              manners
              .
               
              O
               
              Lorenzo
              ,

speaker: JESSICA
text:
If
               
              thou
               
              keep
               
              promise
              ,
               
              I
               
              shall
               
              end
               
              this
               
              strife
              ,

speaker: JESSICA
text:
Become
               
              a
               
              Christian
               
              and
               
              thy
               
              loving
               
              wife
              .
